info.name: The World of Notch - NtmSimpleStyle
info.description:
ATTENTION!!!
This Script is OUTDATED and discontinued!!!
==================================================

This style is made to this site: http://notch.tumblr.com

--- Screens taken with (v0.50) ---
info.additionalInfo:
########## (v0.52) ##########
- Style renamed.
- Small optimizations in the code.
- Small changes to some text sizes.

########## (v0.50) ##########
- Completely reworked style.
- All bugs fixed.

########## (v0.10) ##########
- 1280 pixels wide minimum instead of optimized for.

########## (v0.05) ##########
- 1st public release.

--------------------------------------------------
Some features...
- Optimized for 1280 horizontal pixels minimum.
- Re-organize the things for having a much bigger text and readable.
--------------------------------------------------
